title: feat: add MongoDB Atlas provider for cloud alerts
body:
This PR adds a new provider for MongoDB Atlas that pulls cloud alerts (alerts from projects/groups) into Keep. 

Implementation details:
- New `MongoatlasProvider` class.
- Supports Public API Key, Private API Key, and Group ID.
- Maps Atlas severities (INFORMATIONAL, WARNING, CRITICAL) to Keep severities.
- Uses HTTP Digest Auth for Atlas API.
head: nylyy0325:feat/mongo-atlas-provider
